import{apiCall}from'../../services/api';import{SEARCH_RESULT,ADD_ERROR,REMOVE_ERROR}from'../actionTypes';//action to get restaurant List
function getSearchResult(data){return{type:SEARCH_RESULT,payload:data};}//action to add error
function addError(err){return{type:ADD_ERROR,payload:err};}//action to remove error
function removeError(){return{type:REMOVE_ERROR};}export function searchResults(type,userData){return function(dispatch){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){return apiCall("get","/".concat(type),userData).then(function(data){dispatch(getSearchResult(data));dispatch(removeError());resolve();}).catch(function(err){dispatch(addError(err));reject();});});};}
